documentation.translation[0].definitions: official documents, reports etc that are used to prove that something is true or correct
the act of recording information in writing, on film etc
a careful documentation of the costs
documentation.translation[1].definitions: documents that are used to prove that something is true or correct, or as a record of something
He was asked to provide documentation of his personal finances.
documents that explain how a piece of equipment works
The lack of documentation has caused customers a significant amount of frustration.
